## Using a nomnoml chunk

```{r}
library(nomnoml)
```


  
```{nomnoml, svg=TRUE}
[Hello]-[World]
```

---

## Using an R chunk

```{r}
nomnoml::nomnoml("[Hello]-[World]", svg = TRUE)
```
